channel.title: Poker Bot on Mikhail Shilkov
channel.description: Recent content in Poker Bot on Mikhail Shilkov

item.title: Building a Poker Bot: Functional Fold as Decision Tree Pattern
item.description: This is the fifth part of Building a Poker Bot series where I describe my experience developing bot software to play in online poker rooms. I’m building the bot with .NET framework and F# language which makes the task relatively easy and very enjoyable. Here are the previous parts:
